instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00138 A1398 2015 - Not turning on when battery is connected
threads.message:
- With the battery disconnected, the device turns on with direct power and works perfectly fine. 
- Connected the battery while the machine is on. Battery being detected and charging fine. 
- Device won't turn on with the battery connected. Same behaviour with known good battery and minimal components connected to MLB. 
- Inspected MLB under the microscope. Clean.

Not sure where to start. Please help me.

threads.title: 820-00138 A1398 2015 - Not turning on when battery is connected
threads.message:
Post F7140 voltage w/ and w/o battery connected.
Check exact resistance between pins 17/18 and 27/28 of U7100.

threads.title: 820-00138 A1398 2015 - Not turning on when battery is connected
threads.message:
F7140:
With battery, charger connected - 12.32V
With battery, no charger - 11.67V
Without battery, charger connected - 12.61V
Without battery, no charger - Hovering around 1.5-1.4V.

U7100:
Resistance B/W 17/18 Without charger - 2.8 ohms
Resistance B/W 17/18 with charger - 2.649 Mega ohms

Resistance B/W 27/28 Without charger - 21.8 ohms
Resistance B/W 27/28 with charger - 21.2 ohms

threads.title: 820-00138 A1398 2015 - Not turning on when battery is connected
threads.message:
WHAT???
Did you check resistance on powered board????????????

"Without battery, no charger - Hovering around 1.5-1.4V."
This also "amazing"; what voltage did you expect on the board without any power???
PLEASE, put some logic on your job!

Check again resistance between pins 17/18; remove charger and battery first!!!

Does the board turns on with battery alone (no charger)?

threads.title: 820-00138 A1398 2015 - Not turning on when battery is connected
threads.message:
Sorry for that.

Resistance BETWEEN pin 17/18 - 3.9 ohms
Resistance BETWEEN pin 27/28 - 21.8 ohms

Yes, board turns on with battery connected, freezes on apple logo. Also reprogrammed BIOS with cleanME, same behaviour.

threads.title: 820-00138 A1398 2015 - Not turning on when battery is connected
threads.message:
With both battery and charger connected, board doesn't turn on pressing power button?
Check if SMC_ONOFF_L drops when pressing the button.
If not, use R5115/16 pads, instead of battery bus.

Any history available, liquid signs?
